meanings.definition: A benign tumor made up of newly formed blood vessels.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that hemangiomas are harmless growths of blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: The baby's hemangiomas gradually disappeared as she grew older.
meanings.sent3: The hemangiomas on the tree trunk looked like tiny red flowers blooming.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were dotted with hemangiomas, resembling a constellation of stars.
meanings.sent5: The classroom model showed how hemangiomas can develop in different parts of the body.

meanings.definition: A red birthmark caused by a collection of blood vessels.
meanings.sent1: The hemangiomas on his arm were bright red and noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She was born with a small hemangioma on her forehead.
meanings.sent3: The hemangiomas on the map marked the locations of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The hemangiomas on the horizon glowed like a fiery sunset.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a portrait capturing the unique pattern of hemangiomas on her face.
